turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I would like to order us a Starbucks beverage please from the Starbucks in Downtown Indianapolis in Circle Centre Mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a cherry mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, starbucks does not have a cherry mocha on their menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about a caramel brulee latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Caramel brulee lattes are seasonal drinks and are offered during the christmas season.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. One moment. Let me choose another option, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry about that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a grande.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande cinnamon dolce latte please, with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. And did you want your drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to make that iced, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So the order was 1 grande iced cinnamon dolce latte with 2% milk and whipped cream from starbucks in down town Minneapolis.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that works out. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. Should I place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll I'll pick that up. Please place an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've placed your order. It'll b ready for pick up in 10 mins. The receipt has been sent to your phone as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thank you. You're fantastic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, you're fantastic yourself.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)
